aboutAlternative.text: Specialties: Machine Learning, Statistical Modeling, Python, R, SAS, Hadoop(Hive, Pig), Spark

given.text:
Ying has everything that ensures his success in business analytics.

On the personality side, Ying interacted very well with people of all levels. As an individual contributor, he was highly motivated, learning fast with the "can-do" attitude; as a team player, he was ready to help.

On the technique side, Ying has solid training in mathematics, statistics and programming. He was very capable to translate complex mathematical and statistical problems into computer solvable ones.

Overall, he was one of the best among all interns this summer in Personal Insurance at Travelers. See less

items: Understanding Climate Change: A Data Driven Approach
